This module implements move results.

Imports

cell, common, notice, rule, ../private/arrayutils, ../private/math, ../private/results2, ../private/staticfor

Types

MoveResult = object
  chainCount*: int
  popCounts*: array[Cell, int]
  hardToGarbageCount*: int
  detailPopCounts*: seq[array[Cell, int]]
  detailHardToGarbageCount*: seq[int]
  fullPopCounts*: Opt[seq[array[Cell, seq[int]]]]
Move result.
